text: The 2007–08 season is the Nashville Predators' ninth season in the National Hockey League. == Regular Seasion == == Playoffs == The Predators lost to the Detroit Red Wings in the Conference Quarter-Finals. 2 games to 4. ==References== Category:2007 in ice hockey Category:2008 in ice hockey Category:Nashville Predators Category:National Hockey League team seasons Category:2007 in the United States Category:2008 in the United States Category:2000s in Nashville, Tennessee
title: 2007–08 Nashville Predators season
